special_abilities.name: Arcane Advantage.
descriptions: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Army Arcane.
descriptions: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The hobgoblin is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): acid splash, fire bolt, ray of frost, shocking grasp
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): acid splash, fire bolt, ray of frost, shocking grasp

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, magic missile, thunderwave
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, magic missile, thunderwave

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, Melf's acid arrow, scorching ray
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, Melf's acid arrow, scorching ray

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly, lightning bolt
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly, lightning bolt

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8+1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
